synopsis.text:
One mysterious and treacherous pit, known as the Abyss, has a sinister allure that draws in daring adventurers. Among these explorers is Riko, a young girl determined to follow her mother's path and become a skilled Cave Raider. When Riko receives the heartbreaking news of her mother's demise within the Abyss, she clings to hope, sparked by a cryptic message hinting at her mother's survival.

Fueled by a burning desire to unveil the truth behind her mother's fate, Riko sets out on a perilous expedition accompanied by Reg, a robot boy with human-like qualities. Their journey is a test of their resilience and strength, as they strive to endure the harsh conditions that have claimed countless lives before them.

This captivating anime, which includes a compilation film of the first half of the series, takes viewers on a thrilling adventure, chronicling Riko and Reg's descent into the Abyss. As they traverse its depths and reach the second layer, they encounter the enigmatic White Whistle Ozen, who holds vital information about Riko's missing mother. Will they survive the unforgiving Abyss and unravel the mystery surrounding Riko's mother? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
